title: Contact Book
description: Let user add, view, and save contacts using dictionary and file.
requirements: Create an empty dictionary to hold contacts.
Ask the user to add new contacts (name and number).
Allow the user to view all contacts in the dictionary.
Save contacts to a file using write or json.dump().
starterCode:
# Create an empty dictionary
# Use a menu to add/view/save contacts
expectedOutputExample:
1. Add Contact
2. View Contacts
3. Save and Exit
